price: Nokorε sε, saa (Qur’aan yi) yε afutusεm (mamo), enti obi a ͻpε no ͻnfa ͻkwan a εkͻ ne Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ no so.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi tadhkiratun faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlan
